name: react-image-lightbox

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build:demo && npm run build:umd
scripts.build:demo: npm run clean:demo && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.demo.babel.js --bail
scripts.build:umd: npm run clean:umd && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.umd.babel.js --bail
scripts.clean: npm run clean:demo && npm run clean:umd
scripts.prepublish: npm run lint && npm run build:umd
